message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I appreciate your sense of fairness Alice, but I'm feeling a little bolder this round. How about a 60/40 split?
Okay, Bob, I'm willing to compromise a little. Let's try a 55/45 split in my favor this time. I'm still taking the inflation into account, but I'm hoping we can reach an agreement.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  You're losing money with every round we play.  I'll give you what you offered last time, but that's my final offer.
